Name: Tower SolarPilot Solar Field

ColLabels.String: X Position, Y Position, Z Position

Caption.String: Solar field geometry optimization calculates the number of heliostats above, and tower height, receiver height and diameter on Tower and Receiver page.

Heliostat field availability losses reduce the solar field output to represent component outages, soiling, or other events. SAM applies the time series performance loss as part of the simulation calculations. It only uses the design-point availability when it generates the solar field layout.
Generate heliostat layout using tower dimensions
Optimize heliostat layout and tower dimensions

dens_mirror.Label: Ratio of reflective area to profile

field_model_type.Label: solar field model type
field_model_type.Units: 0=design field and tower/receiver geometry 1=design field 2=user field, calculate performance 3=user performance maps vs solar position

land_max.Label: Max. heliostat distance to tower height ratio

land_min.Label: Min. heliostat distance to tower height ratio

n_azi.Label: Number of azimuth angle data points in file

n_zen.Label: Number of zenith angle data points in file
